wikipedia_page.main: Helen Rogers (born in 1962) is a British singer/songwriter who has been active since 1978. She has been featured vocalist with Brit funk bands Direct Drive and 7th Heaven. She has also been a session singer for Paul Hardcastle.

response: * In 2004, the song was recorded by Paul Hardcastle for the compilation album Jazzmasters (The Smooth Cuts) featuring Helen Rogers on vocals.
*2015: Smooth Jazz Meets Reggae – Helen Rogers – Producer/Co-producer all tracks (Skinny Bwoy Records)
Skinny Bwoy Records is an American record label founded by Reggae songwriter Sadiki. The label's roster of artists includes Sadiki, and Smooth Jazz and Reggae artist Helen Rogers.
*2015: Helen Rogers – Smooth Jazz Meets Reggae
